benchmark_details.name: Hate, Obscenity, and Insults: Measuring the Exposure of Children to Inappropriate Comments in YouTube
benchmark_details.overview: This work contributes to measuring the exposure of children to inappropriate content present in the kidsâ€™ YouTube videos comments, focusing on five age-inappropriate categories: toxic, obscene, insult, threat, and identity hate.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To measure children's exposure to inappropriate comments on YouTube videos.

data.source: YouTube comments and manually annotated datasets from Conversation AI and personal annotations.

methodology.calculation: Using binary-cross-entropy loss for model training.
methodology.interpretation: Accuracy measures how well the model predicts the categories of inappropriate comments.
methodology.validation: The models are trained and fine-tuned on labeled data.

targeted_risks.harm: Exposure of children to inappropriate comments.
